about_the_game:
This is the second chapter of the Crown of Leaves.

Roui's adventure continues! Unexpectedly for him, he finds himself in a strange new world. Here, every corner is filled with singing stars, but does Roui want to stay? Surprise encounters, discoveries, and losses await him along the way, and he still has to complete his commission for the Black Baron...

Find out what will happen to Roui in this new chapter!

  • New locations!
  • New characters!
  • New music by our composer, Blacksmith!
  • Beautiful cutscenes!
